results.deck: Expand and maintain the Aztec Empire through strategic conquest and brutal, 2D combat. Will support the Oculus Rift on PC.
results.name: Aztez

results.deck: The fifth game in Kalypso's dictatorship simulation series. The game improves on trading, technology and research and adds competitive and cooperative multiplayer for the first time in the series.
results.name: Tropico 5

results.deck: Enter the dungeons of dance and fight enemies to the beat of the music.
results.name: Crypt of the NecroDancer

results.deck: Piece together a broken universe in Gravity Ghost.
results.name: Gravity Ghost

results.deck: Life Goes On is a 2D puzzle-platformer where progression sometimes requires sacrifice.
results.name: Life Goes On

results.deck: Sportsfriends is a collection of competitive multiplayer indie games.
results.name: Sportsfriends

results.deck: A roguelike role playing game by Over the Top Games.
results.name: Full Mojo Rampage

results.deck: The next game in the Yakuza franchise, centering on a character named Ryoma Sakamoto.
results.name: Ryu ga Gotoku Ishin!

results.deck: 7 days to die is a Voxel-based, open world sandbox survival game.
results.name: 7 Days to Die

results.deck: EVE: Valkyrie is a multiplayer dogfighting shooter set in the EVE universe and built exclusively for play in virtual reality.
results.name: EVE: Valkyrie

results.deck: PS4 title from Tequila Works.
results.name: Rime

results.deck: A downloadable game inspired by classic RPGs with turn-based combat from the creative director of Far Cry 3, made using the UbiArt engine powering the most recent Rayman games.
results.name: Child of Light

results.deck: Up to 4 players shoot aliens (and possibly each other) with some help from above in this downloadable shooter for PS3, PS4, Vita and PC.
results.name: Helldivers

results.deck: A 'spiritual successor' to the Super Stardust series, Resogun is a voxel-based shoot 'em up that takes place on a cylindrical plane.
results.name: Resogun

results.deck: A game centred around managing music festivals and promoting unsigned artists.
results.name: BigFest

results.deck: A reimagining of the classic Amiga side-scroller.
results.name: Shadow of the Beast

results.deck: A top down shoot 'em up and platformer in one adventure. Velocity 2X is the sequel to the award winning Velocity, and features fast paced gameplay and a teleport mechanic. The heroine Kai Tana blasts, tele-dashes and jumps through interior sections then returns to her Quarp Jet to continue her fight against the Vokh.
results.name: Velocity 2X

results.deck: The Xtreme Legends expansion for Dynasty Warriors 8 introduces three new player characters, Lu Bu's daughter Lu Lingqi, strategist Chen Gong, and Wu general Zhu Ran.
results.name: Dynasty Warriors 8: Xtreme Legends

results.deck: Indie twin stick arena shooter with 4 player co-op.
results.name: Assault Android Cactus

results.deck: Project Phoenix is a JRPG with a squad based RTS game design, brought to you by veteran developers and creators from the East and West.
results.name: Project Phoenix

results.deck: Platforming adventure about a young boy with a big gun, who teams up with a robot in need of a new energy core.
results.name: Kick & Fennick

results.deck: An upgraded console version of scifi racer Switch Galaxy, adding new artwork, more features and levels, licensed music, and a fleshed out story mode.
results.name: Switch Galaxy Ultra

results.deck: Procedurally generated action game, where the player guides firefighter Blaze Carruthers through 16 floors of a skyscraper, putting out the constantly spreading fires.
results.name: Flame Over

results.deck: RTS/tower defense hybrid where the player defends against hordes of robotic insects.
results.name: Final Horizon

results.deck: Mobile action game where the player controls the eponymous droid, trying to eat explosive fruit to kill the evil machines out to kill him.
results.name: Don't Die, Mr. Robot!

results.deck: Sequel to the PSP action-adventure game, where the player hunts down vampires and strips them of their clothing in the Tokyo district Akibahara.
results.name: Akiba's Trip: Undead & Undressed

results.deck: Chroma Squad is a turn-based tactical management simulation game.
results.name: Chroma Squad

results.deck: Road Not Taken is a procedural generated roguelike puzzle game about rescuing children from a forest.
results.name: Road Not Taken

results.deck: An action-platformer headed by Mega Man creator Keiji Inafune, and crowdfunded via Kickstarter. It is heavily inspired by Inafune's Mega Man franchise.
results.name: Mighty No. 9

results.deck: Upcoming First Person Shooter adaptation of the Space Hulk boardgame set in the Warhammer 40,000 universe. It is being developed by the studio behind E.Y.E: Divine Cybermancy and will use Unreal Engine 4.
results.name: Space Hulk: Deathwing

results.deck: Shantae's fourth adventure, funded through Kickstarter.
results.name: Shantae: 1/2 Genie Hero

results.deck: Pavilion is developed by Visiontrick Media and is described as a fourth-person exploratory experience about guidance, influence and subliminal control.
results.name: Pavilion

results.deck: Strategy RPG for PlayStation Platforms.
results.name: Natural Doctrine

results.deck: The two legendary puzzle series unite in this crossover title.
results.name: Puyo Puyo Tetris

results.deck: A 2D puzzle adventure from Ubisoft, set against the backdrop of World War I.
results.name: Valiant Hearts: The Great War

results.deck: An arcade flight simulation during the Vietnam War.
results.name: Air Conflicts: Vietnam

results.deck: Hyper Void is a single player third-person space-shooter that jumps the player through stellar wormholes packed with high-action experience.
results.name: Hyper Void

results.deck: A shmup game developed by D-Pad Studio, featuring Norwegian musician Savant as lead character.
results.name: Savant

results.deck: A 2D action-RPG inspired by A Link to the Past and Diablo developed by Heart Machine.
results.name: Hyper Light Drifter

results.deck: Travel to Africa to hunt the most ferocious beasts alive across 5 different biomes.
results.name: Cabela's African Adventures

results.deck: A follow-up to one of Vita's most acclaimed original games.
results.name: Gravity Rush 2

results.deck: After a space explorer falls from orbit and is rendered either unconscious or dead, the AI system that runs his armour takes direct control of the suit to try and find her partner some medical help.
results.name: The Fall

results.deck: Action puzzle game where the player must use his herds of explosive animals to protect an egg from hungry alien invaders.
results.name: Super Exploding Zoo

results.deck: The official Motocross Grand Prix videogame, covering the 2013 season.
results.name: MXGP

results.deck: Set in the year 1959.B, Jazzpunk tells the non-sequitur tale of secret agent Polyblank, who goes on missions in a bizarre, nonsensical world.
results.name: Jazzpunk

results.deck: Dragon Fin Soup is an action RPG set in a twisted fairy tale world. It is the first game from Grimm Bros.
results.name: Dragon Fin Soup

results.deck: A horror game from Frictional Games. Set at the bottom of the ocean, it explores themes of the self, mind, and consciousness.
results.name: SOMA

results.deck: Puzzle Quest takes on the Marvel Universe with its match three gameplay. The Dark Reign story line is used as the backdrop for this game.
results.name: Marvel Puzzle Quest

results.deck: A puzzle game where players must guide a group of mice to a piece of cheese; the game is available via PC (through Steam and Gog) and PlayStation platforms.
results.name: MouseCraft

results.deck: Wave based first person defense shooter, where the player must mount a turret and fend of hordes of vicious attacking bunnies.
results.name: Blast 'Em Bunnies

results.deck: An Action RPG based on the Sword Art Online franchise.
results.name: Sword Art Online: Hollow Fragment

results.deck: Randall is a telepathic hero seeking to free his homeland from an oppressive corporation.
results.name: Randall

results.deck: A dungeon crawler that seeks to weigh the psychological effects of delving into hellish monster abodes, not just the damage to HP. Team chemistry means more than just skill synergy.
results.name: Darkest Dungeon

results.deck: A Beenox-developed sequel to the open world web-slinging game. High Voltage Software is developing the 3DS version.
results.name: The Amazing Spider-Man 2

results.deck: A free-to-play, open world winter sports game.
results.name: SNOW

results.deck: A '70s B-Movie game where the player drives a constantly revolving limousine! Pick up passengers, find secret collectibles, take on dangerous missions, and fall in love in a far out open world puzzle adventure.
results.name: Roundabout

results.deck: A survival horror game set fifteen years after the original Alien film. It stars Amanda Ripley, the daughter of the film's protagonist, Ellen Ripley.
results.name: Alien: Isolation

results.deck: An on-rails shooter for the PC, Xbox One and Playstation 4, designed for use with the Leap Motion peripheral(PC). Based on the comic book series Blue Estate.
results.name: Blue Estate

results.deck: The host girls take to the stage with song and coordinated dance routines in this free to play Dream C Club spin-off.
results.name: Dream C Club: Host Girls on Stage

results.deck: EA Sports brings their golf franchise to PlayStation 4 and Xbox One.
results.name: Rory McIlroy PGA Tour

results.deck: An incredibly short but heartwarming game about climbing into the sky.
results.name: Castles in the Sky

results.deck: A first-person survival horror adventure amongst the mountains and fjords of the Norwegian west coast in the 1920s.
results.name: Draugen

results.deck: Videoball is a competitive multiplayer game for up to six players that combines elements of first-person shooters, real-time strategy, and conventional sports in a top-down, arcade-style game.
results.name: Videoball

results.deck: Sony's critically acclaimed Major League Baseball franchise continues into the next generation.
results.name: MLB 14: The Show

results.deck: A psychedelic music and rhythm game from two ex-Harmonix developers.
results.name: Thumper

results.deck: The Fyzz Facility brings Backgammon to PlayStation platforms, both the traditional game as well as a faster paced Blitz! mode.
results.name: Backgammon Blitz

results.deck: Mitsurugi Kamui Hikae is an arena-based character action game that focuses on combos and eliminating multiple foes at once by sheathing your sword.
results.name: Mitsurugi Kamui Hikae

results.deck: An open-world action-adventure game by Monolith, set between the events of The Hobbit and The Lord of the Rings.
results.name: Middle-earth: Shadow of Mordor

results.deck: Naughty Dog charts treasure hunter Nathan Drake's final adventure in the fourth entry of this action-adventure, swash-buckling saga.
results.name: Uncharted 4: A Thief's End

results.deck: Polyphony Digital is bringing Gran Turismo to PlayStation 4.
results.name: Gran Turismo Sport

results.deck: LEGO returns to Middle-earth with this video game adaptation of the first two Hobbit movies.
results.name: LEGO The Hobbit

results.deck: A spin-off of the Borderlands series of first-person shooters, Tales from the Borderlands is an episodic adventure game where a reluctant group of civilians try to strike it rich in the hostile world of Pandora.
results.name: Tales from the Borderlands

results.deck: Based on the epic-fantasy television series of the same name, Game of Thrones is an episodic adventure game that tells the story of House Forrester, whose fate is threatened by the War of the Five Kings.
results.name: Game of Thrones: A Telltale Game Series

results.deck: A procedurally generated space exploration game from Hello Games, the creators of Joe Danger.
results.name: No Man's Sky

results.deck: Chaos;Child is the fourth major entry in the Science Adventure franchise of visual novels.
results.name: Chaos;Child

results.deck: High school romantic comedy visual novel by GIGA.
results.name: Ano Ko wa Ore kara Hanarenai

results.deck: A pool game for the PlayStation 4, Xbox One, and PC containing no less than 100% all-natural billiards.
results.name: Pure Pool

results.deck: Silence is the sequel to Daedalic Entertainment’s popular fantasy adventure game The Whispered World and features a new lead character and 3D graphics.
results.name: Silence: The Whispered World 2

results.deck: Dex is a sidescrolling cyberpunk action/stealth-RPG funded through Kickstarter. Inspired by classic cyperpunk novels, the game lets players explore the hand-drawn city of Harbor Prime.
results.name: Dex

results.deck: The fifteenth flagship title in the long running Tales series.
results.name: Tales of Zestiria

results.deck: Kickstarter funded futuristic sports game inspired by the developer's work on the swinging mechanic in 2004's Spider-Man 2 game.
results.name: Energy Hook

results.deck: Digimon Story is a monster training RPG set in the future.
results.name: Digimon Story: Cyber Sleuth

results.deck: A medieval open world RPG focused on period-accurate fighting and technique.
results.name: Kingdom Come: Deliverance

results.deck: Towards the end of the interstellar wars, when chaos spread, one band of elite mercenaries acted more like pirates and looters than actual soldiers. The leader of this group was the notorious and infamous Colonel Nestor.
results.name: 1993 Space Machine

results.deck: Grave is a survival horror experience set in an open world, currently available for PC, Mac, consoles and Oculus Rift.
results.name: Grave

results.deck: A multiplayer-focused game that features narwhals battling in space.
results.name: Starwhal

results.deck: A first-person shooter that is attempting to blur the line between single player and multiplayer, developed by The Farm 51.
results.name: Get Even

results.deck: MMORPG based on Koei's long running Nobunaga's Ambition franchise. Launched in 2003 on the PlayStation 2, it will soon move to it's third generation of Sony hardware when the PlayStation 4 version debuts.
results.name: Nobunaga no Yabou Online

results.deck: Physics based puzzle game where the player controls the monstrous King Oddball in his quest to demolish anything in his path using boulders hurled with his tongue.
results.name: King Oddball

results.deck: Night In The Woods is a 2D story-focused adventure/exploration game with a striking art style. Based in the town of Possum Springs the game revolves around college dropout Mae and her friends, who may be facing the end of the world as they know it.
results.name: Night in the Woods

results.deck: The 2015 Midwinter reboot is a open world, first person, action role playing game with strategy elements.
results.name: Midwinter

results.deck: A game where players control a housecat who must knock as much of its owner's property onto the ground as possible.
results.name: Catlateral Damage

results.deck: Major League Baseball is getting into the video game business with the release of a new game that says "RBI Baseball" right on the (digital) cover.
results.name: R.B.I. Baseball 14

results.deck: Indie horror game inspired by Japanese mythology.
results.name: Kodoku

results.deck: An action focused free to play MMORPG based on Japanese mythology.
results.name: Onigiri

results.deck: An upcoming game in the Call of Cthulhu franchise from Cyanide Studio and Focus Home Interactive.
results.name: Call of Cthulhu - The Video Game

results.deck: The sixth game in IO Interactive's sneaky murder sim franchise, simply titled Hitman, adopts an episodic design wherein it will continually introduce new assassination contracts for players to undertake.
results.name: Hitman

results.deck: A compilation of the Adam's Venture adventure games ported to the PlayStation 3.
results.name: Adam's Venture Chronicles

results.deck: Shutshimi is a shoot 'em up about a shotgun-wielding fish with arms. The fish has a 10-second memory, so stages last only 10 seconds, as do the upgrade screens between stages.
results.name: Shutshimi

results.deck: A next generation Golf Simulator developed by HB Studios.
results.name: The Golf Club
